snippet: The Yankees have been attempting to keep their payroll below $189 million in 2014. Alex Rodriguez’s suspension makes that possible and frees them to make a strong contract offer to Masahiro Tanaka
abstract: New York Yankees have been attempting to keep their payroll below $189 million in 2014; Alex Rodriguez’s suspension makes that possible and frees them to make a strong contract offer to Japanese pitcher Masahiro Tanaka
lead_paragraph: The Yankees have been attempting to keep their payroll below $189 million in 2014. Alex Rodriguez’s suspension makes that possible and frees them to make a strong contract offer to Masahiro Tanaka

headline.main: For Yanks, Some Payroll Relief Now but Questions Down the Road
headline.print_headline: For Yanks, Some Payroll Relief Now but Questions Down the Road
